DOC.detailed_description: Measles meningitis C hot topic China recent year . Although China set goal measles elimination , many measles case find age < 8 month meningitis C become public health issue since meningitis group A control low level little known C group . So investigator design observation study two antibody . Maternal antibody suppose wane birth .
